_source.text: According to our source, their agents pay better than others, and bring their own balance to double-check the weight of the tusks.

text: According to our source, their agents pay **better** **than** others, and bring their own **balance** to double-**check** the weight of the tusks.

_source.text: #22: Markus K (kamikazow) (2009-04-25 12:49:41) (reply to #21) Yes, aria supports resuming -- even better than wget (don't know about curl), because aria uses the file size to check whether the to-be- downloaded file changed.

text: **better** **than** wget (don't know about **curl**), because aria uses the file size to **check** whether the to-be- downloaded file changed.

_source.text: 2. Arco Iris - This is true Cuban Food....It does not get better than this hole in the wall restaurant in Tampa....GREAT FOOD! and near the stadium as well 3. _source.text: Adding audio outputs and a 18MB buffer is the only extra you get for the additional $50 - the comparison table also claims that KDV 5000 is better for plasma/LCD - I usually take these kinds of claims with a pinch of salt until I check it out for myself.
